籤詩版本二:
Misali, idan rana ta uku, ta hudu, ko ta biyar ta bata, to rabi babu, rabi babu kuma bai cika ba.
Jiran abun ciye-ciye na tsakar dare a rana ta goma sha biyar ta shekara, komai yana da haske da cika
詩意:
A cikin wannan hexagram, wata ya ɓace amma bai cika ba.
Ka yi haƙuri a kan komai.
解曰: Kasance mai ra'ayin mazan jiya kuma jira. Kamar watan farkon wata. Jiran lokacin zagaye. Babu wani abu mara kyau.
籤詩故事一:
◇Li Yuan ya hau kan karagar mulki
A cikin shekaru na karshe na daular Sui, sarki Yang na daular Sui ya kasance mai cin hanci da rashawa, yana jin dadi a ko'ina, yana haifar da bacin rai a tsakanin mutane da kuma raba daular tsakanin jarumai.
A shekara ta 618 miladiyya, Yu Wenhuaji, Sima Dekan, Pei Qantong da sauransu suka kaddamar da wani yunkuri na kashe sarki Yang na daular Sui kuma suka shelanta Yang Hao a matsayin sarki.
Ba da da ewa ba Yu Wenhuaji ya kashe Qin Wanghao kuma ya shelanta kansa sarki Xu, ya kafa kasar Xu.
A shekara mai zuwa, Tang Janar Li Shentong da Sarkin Xia Dou Jiande suka hallaka shi tare.
Bayan da yankin Tsakiyar Tsakiya ya sami labarin mutuwar sarki Yang, mai gadin Luoyang Wang Shichong ya goyi bayan Sarki Dong na Yue a matsayin sarki, wato Sarkin sarakuna Ai na daular Sui.
A wannan lokacin, Li Yuan ya kori Yang You, ya shelanta kansa a matsayin sarki a Taiyuan, ya kuma canza sunan kasar zuwa Tang. Wannan shine Tang Gaozu.
聖意: Iyali da gida suna yi wa kansu fatan alheri da rani da kaka, neman arziki, kulla yarjejeniya, jira lokaci, aure ya makara, Liujia ta haifi diya mace, an toshe masu tafiya a kasa, tsutsotsin siliki sun tsaya tsayin daka, dabbobi sun yi karko, shi samun mutane yana da wahala, shari’ar jama’a da ƙaura sun kasance masu ra’ayin mazan jiya, dukiyoyi da aka yi hasarar wuya, rashin lafiya ya yi wuya a kafa, a aika zuwa kabarin dutse, a canza shi.
古人: Li Yuan ya hau kan karagar mulki
